name: RUBx
description: RUBx is a tokenized stablecoin pegged 1:1 to the Russian ruble. Every unit of RUBx is fully backed by an equivalent amount of fiat rubles held in reserve. The token is designed for use in digital payments and settlements, enabling fast and transparent ruble-denominated transactions in a blockchain environment. RUBx is audited, compliant with local regulations, and integrated with select wallets for seamless fiat-to-crypto exchange.
